languages.text: {n}Нет времени для раздумий! Вы сосредотачиваете дарованную вам пси-силу на кончиках пальцев и вскидываете руку в сторону Немезита. Воздух леденеет, но парень тоже целится в вас, ехидно улыбаясь. Черное дуло, направленное в вашу сторону, медленно покрывается инеем, и мир вокруг сужается в тонкую линию.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Нет времени для раздумий! Вы сосредотачиваете дарованную вам пси-силу на кончиках пальцев и вскидываете руку в сторону Немезита. Воздух леденеет, но парень тоже целится в вас, ехидно улыбаясь. Черное дуло, направленное в вашу сторону, медленно покрывается инеем, и мир вокруг сужается в тонкую линию.{/n}

languages.text: {n}There is no time to deliberate! You summon your gift, concentrate your psychic power at your fingertips, and raise a hand in Nemesite's direction. The air grows frigid, but the rebel is already aiming his gun at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The black muzzle of the stub revolver stares at you, a coating of frost forming along the barrel, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

languages.text: {n}¡No hay tiempo para hablar! Invocas tu don, concentras tu poder psíquico en la punta de tus dedos y alzas una mano en dirección a Nemesitio, pero el rebelde ya te está apuntando con una sonrisa malévola en su rostro. El cañón negro de su revólver compacto te mira a los ojos bajo una capa de escarcha, y el mundo que te rodea se limita a una delgada línea.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no time to deliberate! You summon your gift, concentrate your psychic power at your fingertips, and raise a hand in Nemesite's direction. The air grows frigid, but the rebel is already aiming his gun at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The black muzzle of the stub revolver stares at you, a coating of frost forming along the barrel, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}¡No hay tiempo para hablar! Invocas tu don, concentras tu poder psíquico en la punta de tus dedos y alzas una mano en dirección a Nemesitio, pero el rebelde ya te está apuntando con una sonrisa malévola en su rostro. El cañón negro de su revólver compacto te mira a los ojos bajo una capa de escarcha, y el mundo que te rodea se limita a una delgada línea.{/n}

languages.text: {n}細かい事を考える時間はない！あなたは自分の能力を呼び起こし、指先に超能力を集中させ、ネメサイトに向かって手を上げる。空気が冷たくなりながらも、反乱軍はすでにあなたに向けて銃を向けていた。リボルバーの黒い銃口があなたを見つめていて、樽に沿って霜がこびりついている。あなたの周りの世界が、細い線の様に変わっていった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no time to deliberate! You summon your gift, concentrate your psychic power at your fingertips, and raise a hand in Nemesite's direction. The air grows frigid, but the rebel is already aiming his gun at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The black muzzle of the stub revolver stares at you, a coating of frost forming along the barrel, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}細かい事を考える時間はない！あなたは自分の能力を呼び起こし、指先に超能力を集中させ、ネメサイトに向かって手を上げる。空気が冷たくなりながらも、反乱軍はすでにあなたに向けて銃を向けていた。リボルバーの黒い銃口があなたを見つめていて、樽に沿って霜がこびりついている。あなたの周りの世界が、細い線の様に変わっていった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}已经没时间考虑了！你凝聚力量，将灵能的力量集中在指间，朝涅墨斯特的方向举起一只手，周围的空气也随之变冷。然而，涅墨斯特手中的枪口早已对准了你。他的脸上露出了恶毒的笑容，短筒左轮手枪黑色的枪口瞄准了你，枪管上起了一层霜。你周围的世界缩成了一条细线。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no time to deliberate! You summon your gift, concentrate your psychic power at your fingertips, and raise a hand in Nemesite's direction. The air grows frigid, but the rebel is already aiming his gun at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The black muzzle of the stub revolver stares at you, a coating of frost forming along the barrel, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}已经没时间考虑了！你凝聚力量，将灵能的力量集中在指间，朝涅墨斯特的方向举起一只手，周围的空气也随之变冷。然而，涅墨斯特手中的枪口早已对准了你。他的脸上露出了恶毒的笑容，短筒左轮手枪黑色的枪口瞄准了你，枪管上起了一层霜。你周围的世界缩成了一条细线。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zum Nachdenken ist keine Zeit! Du beschwörst deine Gabe, konzentrierst deine psionischen Kräfte in den Fingerspitzen und hebst eine Hand in Nemesits Richtung. Die Luft erkaltet, aber der Rebell zielt bereits mit seiner Waffe auf dich und grinst bösartig über das ganze Gesicht. Die schwarze Mündung des Stummelrevolvers starrt dich an, eine Eisschicht bildet sich entlang des Laufs, und die Welt um dich herum verengt sich zu einer dünnen Linie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no time to deliberate! You summon your gift, concentrate your psychic power at your fingertips, and raise a hand in Nemesite's direction. The air grows frigid, but the rebel is already aiming his gun at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The black muzzle of the stub revolver stares at you, a coating of frost forming along the barrel, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zum Nachdenken ist keine Zeit! Du beschwörst deine Gabe, konzentrierst deine psionischen Kräfte in den Fingerspitzen und hebst eine Hand in Nemesits Richtung. Die Luft erkaltet, aber der Rebell zielt bereits mit seiner Waffe auf dich und grinst bösartig über das ganze Gesicht. Die schwarze Mündung des Stummelrevolvers starrt dich an, eine Eisschicht bildet sich entlang des Laufs, und die Welt um dich herum verengt sich zu einer dünnen Linie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pas le temps de tergiverser ! Vous faites appel à votre don, concentrez vos pouvoirs psychiques au bout de vos doigts et levez une main en direction de Némésite. L'atmosphère devient subitement glaciale, mais le rebelle vous tient déjà en joue, un sourire malveillant aux lèvres. Recouverte d'une fine couche de givre, la bouche noire de son revolver est braquée sur votre personne, et le monde autour de vous se réduit à une simple ligne.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no time to deliberate! You summon your gift, concentrate your psychic power at your fingertips, and raise a hand in Nemesite's direction. The air grows frigid, but the rebel is already aiming his gun at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The black muzzle of the stub revolver stares at you, a coating of frost forming along the barrel, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pas le temps de tergiverser ! Vous faites appel à votre don, concentrez vos pouvoirs psychiques au bout de vos doigts et levez une main en direction de Némésite. L'atmosphère devient subitement glaciale, mais le rebelle vous tient déjà en joue, un sourire malveillant aux lèvres. Recouverte d'une fine couche de givre, la bouche noire de son revolver est braquée sur votre personne, et le monde autour de vous se réduit à une simple ligne.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ölçüp biçecek vakit yok! Yetini harekete geçiriyorsun, hizmetindeki ruhsezi gücüne konsantre oluyorsun ve Nemezit'in bulunduğu yöne doğru bir elini kaldırıyorsun. Hava soğumaya başlıyor. İsyancı ise suratına yayılan kindar sırıtış eşliğinde silahını hâlihazırda sana doğrultmuş. Bodur altıpatların siyah ağzı sana bakıyor, namlunun etrafında bir buz tabakası oluşuyor. Etrafını saran dünya, incecik bir çizgiye dönüşüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no time to deliberate! You summon your gift, concentrate your psychic power at your fingertips, and raise a hand in Nemesite's direction. The air grows frigid, but the rebel is already aiming his gun at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The black muzzle of the stub revolver stares at you, a coating of frost forming along the barrel, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}
